icc  -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,MPI.so -o CMakeFiles/CMakeRelink.dir/MPI.so CMakeFiles/MPI.dir/mpi4py-1.3/src/MPI.c.o /u/system/SLES11/soft/python27/python/2.7.11/lib/libpython2.7.so /opt/ibmhpc/pecurrent/mpich2/intel/lib64/libmpi.so /opt/ibmhpc/pecurrent/mpich2/intel/lib64/libmpigc4.so -ldl /u/system/SLES11/soft/intel1/14.0/compiler/lib/intel64/libirc.so -lpthread -lrt
